Messages.CraftBlockedItem: {0} is blocked and can not be crafted!
Messages.CurrentCraftingRate: The crafting rate is set to {0}.
Messages.InvalidItem: {0} is not a valid item. Please use the name of the item as it appears in the item list. Ex: Camp Fire
Messages.ModifyCraftingRate: The crafting rate is now set to {0}.
Messages.ModifyError: The new crafting rate must be a number between 0 and 2 where 0 is instant craft, 1 is normal and 2 is double!
Messages.NoItemSpecified: You need to specify an item to block/unblock.
Messages.NoPermission: You don't have permission to use this command.
Messages.UnblockSucces: {0} is no longer blocked from crafting.
